channel.title: Code on blag
channel.description: Recent content in Code on blag

item.title: Catching SIGTERM in Python
item.description: Simple code example to show catching SIGTERM in a Python script.

item.title: Git/Github fork-pull request-update cycle
item.description: When contributing to Open Source Projects, new contributors often run into problems of having multiple merge commits and issues with keeping the forked repo in sync. This post addresses solutions for some of the problems.

item.title: Using uWSGI with Python 3
item.description: Simple steps to get uWSGI up and running in Python 3.

item.title: Staying Ahead of Amazon, in Amazon Treasure Hunt Contest
item.description: With a simple Man In The Middle (MITM) attack, I tried to cheat(?) one of Amazon India’s contest.

item.title: An exploit on Gaana.com gave me access to their entire User Database
item.description: In May, 2015 I found an exploit on Gaana.com, which let me access their entire User Database (more than 10 Million) which included all the user info.

item.title: Scraping Javascript page using Python
item.description: Simple code example to illustrate scraping a javascript driven website, using Python and Dryscape.
